question: Nike is the world's largest sportswear company. What was Nike's total revenue in its fiscal year 2024 (ending May 2024)?
Nike has been pushing hard into direct-to-consumer sales through its own stores and apps. How much revenue did Nike Direct generate in FY2024?
North America is Nike's home turf and biggest market. How much revenue did the North America segment generate in FY2024?
Nike commands premium pricing across its footwear and apparel lines. What was Nike's gross profit margin percentage in FY2024?
Coca-Cola sells beverages in over 200 countries and territories. What was Coca-Cola's total net revenue in fiscal year 2024?
From Sprite to Fanta to the original Coke, Coca-Cola's brands are consumed worldwide. Roughly how many servings of Coca-Cola Company beverages are consumed per day globally?
Coca-Cola's asset-light bottling model drives strong margins. What was Coca-Cola's operating income in FY2024?
Coca-Cola is one of the most global brands on Earth. What percentage of Coca-Cola's revenue comes from outside North America?
Starbucks has gone from a single Pike Place store to a global empire. How many Starbucks stores were open worldwide at the end of FY2024 (Sept 2024)?
Between lattes, Frappuccinos, and food items, what was Starbucks' total net revenue in FY2024?
China is Starbucks' second-largest market and a huge growth driver. How many Starbucks stores were operating in China at the end of FY2024?
Starbucks Rewards is one of the most successful loyalty programs in retail. How many active Starbucks Rewards members were there in the U.S. at the end of FY2024?
Unlike many fast-food chains, Starbucks operates a large share of its own U.S. stores. How many company-operated Starbucks stores were in the U.S. at end of FY2024?
McDonald's has shifted heavily toward franchising. What percentage of McDonald's 40,000+ restaurants worldwide are franchised (not company-operated)?
Despite being 95% franchised, McDonald's still collects massive revenue from rent and royalties. What was McDonald's total revenue in FY2024?
Systemwide sales captures total sales across all McDonald's restaurants globally, including franchisees. What were McDonald's systemwide sales in FY2024?
From Times Square to Tokyo, McDonald's golden arches are everywhere. How many McDonald's restaurants were open worldwide at the end of 2024?
McDonald's franchise-heavy model is enormously profitable. What was McDonald's operating income in FY2024?

PepsiCo has significant operations outside the U.S. What percentage of PepsiCo's total revenue comes from international markets?
Many people think of PepsiCo as a soda company, but snacks are actually huge. Roughly what percentage of PepsiCo's revenue comes from food and snacks (vs. beverages)?
Walmart is the world's largest company by revenue. What was Walmart's total revenue in its fiscal year 2025 (ending Jan 2025)?
Walmart is the largest private employer in the world. Approximately how many associates (employees) does Walmart have worldwide?
There's a Walmart within 10 miles of 90% of Americans. How many Walmart U.S. stores (including Sam's Club) were operating at end of FY2025?
Walmart has invested heavily in e-commerce to compete with Amazon. Roughly how much did Walmart's global e-commerce sales total in FY2025?
Walmart operates in about 19 countries outside the U.S. What was Walmart International's net sales in FY2025?
Costco's warehouse model drives massive volume on thin margins. What was Costco's total revenue (including membership fees) in FY2024 (ending Sept 2024)?
Costco's membership fees are basically pure profit and subsidize low product prices. How much did Costco collect in membership fee revenue in FY2024?
Costco has an incredibly loyal membership base. How many paid member households did Costco have at the end of FY2024?
Costco opens new warehouses carefully compared to other retailers. How many Costco warehouse locations were open worldwide at end of FY2024?
Costco's membership renewal rate is legendary in retail. What was Costco's membership renewal rate in the U.S. and Canada in FY2024?
Disney spans theme parks, movies, streaming, TV networks, and cruise ships. What was Walt Disney Company's total revenue in FY2024 (ending Sept 2024)?
Disney's Parks, Experiences and Products segment includes theme parks, cruise lines, and merchandise. What was this segment's revenue in FY2024?
Disney+ launched in November 2019 and rapidly grew its subscriber base. How many Disney+ subscribers (including Hotstar) were there at end of FY2024?
Disney's streaming segment includes Disney+, Hulu, and ESPN+. What was the total streaming revenue for Disney's Direct-to-Consumer segment in FY2024?
Procter & Gamble makes everyday products like Tide, Pampers, Gillette, and Crest. What was P&G's net sales in FY2024 (ending June 2024)?
P&G's Fabric & Home Care segment includes Tide, Downy, Cascade, and Swiffer. What was this segment's revenue in FY2024?
P&G's portfolio of premium consumer brands commands strong pricing power. What was P&G's gross profit margin in FY2024?
P&G focuses on a portfolio of mega-brands. How many of P&G's individual brands generate over $1 billion in annual sales?
